description: Professional-grade image-to-video generation with advanced prompt optimization and high-quality output

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation from the input image
prompt.placeholder: Man walked into winter cave with polar bear

image_url.description: URL of the input image to animate into video

prompt_optimizer.description: Whether to use the model's prompt optimizer for better results

prompt_details.style_guide: Create clear, descriptive prompts that explain the desired motion and action for professional image-to-video generation
best_practices: Describe the specific action or movement you want to see
Mention timing and pacing of the motion
Be specific about character actions and interactions
Consider the relationship between the prompt and the input image
Focus on cinematic quality and professional results

prompt_structure.action_description: What action or movement should occur
prompt_structure.subject_interaction: How subjects interact with the environment
prompt_structure.motion_timing: Pacing and flow of the movement
prompt_structure.visual_continuity: How the motion relates to the input image

example_prompts.title: Nature Scene Animation Pro
example_prompts.prompt: Man walked into winter cave with polar bear

example_prompts.title: Urban Movement Pro
example_prompts.prompt: A person walking through a busy city street with cars passing by and people moving in the background, creating a dynamic urban scene with natural motion and realistic interactions

example_requests.title: Professional Image-to-Video
example_requests.description: High-quality video generation from an image

request.prompt: A cat walking through a garden with natural movement and graceful steps

example_requests.title: Cinematic Animation
example_requests.description: Professional cinematic animation with optimized prompt

request.prompt: A professional chef cooking in a modern kitchen with steam rising and ingredients being prepared, creating a dynamic culinary scene

example_requests.title: Character Animation Pro
example_requests.description: Professional character animation with detailed motion

request.prompt: A dancer performing a graceful routine in a studio with flowing movements and dynamic poses, creating a beautiful dance sequence

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: Use clear, action-oriented prompts that describe the desired motion
Enable prompt optimizer for enhanced results with complex prompts
Ensure your input image is high quality and relevant to the desired motion
Focus on cinematic quality and professional results
This pro version is optimized for high-quality, professional animation
limitations: No duration customization (uses optimized default duration)
Input image must be accessible via URL
Processing time may be longer for high-quality output
Complex scenes with many elements may be challenging
